## isPrimitive variable

Whatever argument is primitive or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isPrimitive: (val: unknown) => val is Primitive
```

## Remarks

Definition of Primitive - string - number - bigint - boolean - symbol - undefined - null

## Example


```ts
isPrimitive(true) // true
isPrimitive([]) // false

```
